Package radialcolordialog

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlphaSliderListener
    AlphaSlider listener handles notification when the alpha channel changes.
    ColorBandListener
    Listener class for ColorBands.
    ControlListener
    ControlListener interface for updates from the ControlPanel numerical controls.
    DisplayListener
    Listener class for listening to the Display Panel where all on interactive color editing goes on.
    InteractiveSlider
    Interface used to allow both ColorBands and the AlphaSlider to use the same hit test and update mechanism.
    NumericalControlListener
    Listener for the numerical input fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphaSlider
    The AlphaSlider is a linear slider for the Alpha Channel.
    CheckerBoard
    This is a utility class to generate a checkerboard background image to use with display components that have alpha values.
    ColorBand
    The ColorBand is a radially aligned slider for color channels (r,g,b, etc.).
    ColorBandEvent
    This is the event class for ColorBand change events.
    ColorRange
    This is a helper class for interpolating between two ColorTuples.
    ColorTuple
    Color Tuple describes either a RGB Color or HSB Color with an Alpha channel.
    ControlHandle
    This a class for the graphic representation of control handles used by the sliders.
    ControlPanel
    The Control panel manages all the numeric inputs for the color channels.
    DisplayPanel
    The DisplayPanel manages all the color channel sliders (ColorBands and AlphaSlider), and is the interactive area for color selection.
    NumericalControl
    This is the class for numerical controls for a Color Channel (r,g,b, etc.).
    RadialColorDialog
    This is a color selection dialog box where the sliders are arc shaped bands with the exception of the alpha slider.
    Util
    A collection of general utility functions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Channel
    Channel is used for storing the target channel of a ColorBand control.
    TupleType
    TupleType is used to signify the color type of a color band (RGB or HSB)
